verses.verse: Then I turned,<WH7725> and lifted up<WH5375> mine eyes,<WH5869> and looked,<WH7200> and behold<WH2009> a flying<WH5774> roll.<WH4039>

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, What<WH4100> seest<WH7200> thou?<WH859> And I answered,<WH559> I<WH589> see<WH7200> a flying<WH5774> roll;<WH4039> the length<WH753> thereof is twenty<WH6242> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> thereof ten<WH6235> cubits.<WH520>

Then said<WH559> he unto<WH413> me, This<WH2063> is the curse<WH423> that goeth forth<WH3318> over<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the whole<WH3605> earth:<WH776> for<WH3588> every one<WH3605> that stealeth<WH1589> shall be cut off<WH5352> as on this side<WH4480> <WH2088> according to it;<WH3644> and every<WH3605> one that sweareth<WH7650> shall be cut off<WH5352> as on that side<WH4480> <WH2088> according to it.<WH3644>

I will bring it forth,<WH3318> saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> and it shall enter<WH935> into<WH413> the house<WH1004> of the thief,<WH1590> and into<WH413> the house<WH1004> of him that sweareth<WH7650> falsely<WH8267> by my name:<WH8034> and it shall remain<WH3885> in the midst<WH8432> of his house,<WH1004> and shall consume<WH3615> it with the timber<WH6086> thereof and the stones<WH68> thereof.

Then the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me went forth,<WH3318> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Lift up<WH5375> now<WH4994> thine eyes,<WH5869> and see<WH7200> what<WH4100> is this<WH2063> that goeth forth.<WH3318>

And I said,<WH559> What<WH4100> is it?<WH1931> And he said,<WH559> This<WH2063> is an ephah<WH374> that goeth forth.<WH3318> He said<WH559> moreover, This<WH2063> is their resemblance<WH5869> through all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
And, behold,<WH2009> there was lifted up<WH5375> a talent<WH3603> of lead:<WH5777> and this<WH2063> is a<WH259> woman<WH802> that sitteth<WH3427> in the midst<WH8432> of the ephah.<WH374>

And he said,<WH559> This<WH2063> is wickedness.<WH7564> And he cast<WH7993> it into<WH413> the midst<WH8432> of the ephah;<WH374> and he cast<WH7993> <WH853> the weight<WH68> of lead<WH5777> upon<WH413> the mouth<WH6310> thereof.

Then lifted I up<WH5375> mine eyes,<WH5869> and looked,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> there came out<WH3318> two<WH8147> women,<WH802> and the wind<WH7307> was in their wings;<WH3671> for they<WH2007> had wings<WH3671> like the wings<WH3671> of a stork:<WH2624> and they lifted up<WH5375> <WH853> the ephah<WH374> between<WH996> the earth<WH776> and the heaven.<WH8064>
Then said<WH559> I to<WH413> the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me, Whither<WH575> do these<WH1992> bear<WH1980> <WH853> the ephah?<WH374>

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, To build<WH1129> it a house<WH1004> in the land<WH776> of Shinar:<WH8152> and it shall be established,<WH3559> and set<WH5117> there<WH8033> upon<WH5921> her own base.<WH4369>
